description: The underlying cause of the issue highlighted relates to the need for additional steps when addressing vulnerabilities associated with CVE-2024-23593. The process encountered difficulties surrounding the WinRE (Windows Recovery Environment) update, which necessitated specific actions like ensuring adequate free space and resizing partitions. Related KB Articles, namely KB-5034441 and KB-5034232, contain essential instructions for mitigating the effects of this vulnerability. This complexity may indicate unidentified factors affecting the SafeOS security patch implementation, particularly impacting build operations post-update. Such factors can hinder recovery attempts, particularly when addressing the aforementioned vulnerabilities in the specified KBs.
